NotSet.description: The verification result is not set.

Compatible.description: Asset does not match expectation but is compatible.

Mismatch.description: Asset does not match expectation and is not compatible.

AssetCompatibility.description: Verify whether an Asset’s functionality matches or is compatible to the expectation of system engineering.

AssetIdentity.description: Verify whether an Asset’s identity meets the expectation of system engineering.

AssetIdentityAndCompatibility.description: Verify whether an Asset’s identity meets the expectation of system engineering and whether its functionality matches or is compatible to the expectation of system engineering.

ActionEstablishConnectionsEnabled.description: The ConnectionManager shall establish enabled Connections from the ConnectionConfigurationSets.

ActionEstablishConnectionsDisabled.description: The ConnectionManager shall establish disabled Connections from the ConnectionConfigurationSets.

ActionEstablishConnections.description: The ConnectionManager shall establish Connections from the ConnectionConfigurationSets.

ActionRemoveConnections.description: The ConnectionManager shall disable and remove Connections from the ConnectionConfigurationSets.

ActionEnableConnections.description: The ConnectionManager shall enable Connections from the ConnectionConfigurationSets.

ActionDisableConnections.description: The ConnectionManager shall disable Connections from the ConnectionConfigurationSets.

EstablishEnabled.description: The last activity of the ConnectionManager was establishing a connection (enabled).

EstablishDisabled.description: The last activity of the ConnectionManager was establishing a connection (disabled).

Establish.description: The last activity of the ConnectionManager was establishing a connection.

Remove.description: The last activity of the ConnectionManager was to remove a connection.

Enable.description: The last activity of the ConnectionManager was to enable a connection.

Disable.description: The last activity of the ConnectionManager was to disable a connection.

Error.description: If this bit is set, then the last activity of the ConnectionManager failed; if this bit is cleared, then the last activity of the ConnectionManager was a success.

ConnectionNotMonitored.description: ConnectionManager does not monitor the state of the Connection

ConnectionInitial.description: Connection is being established, but communication model is not linked to ConnectionEndpoint

ConnectionReady.description: Connection is established but communication model is disabled

ConnectionPreOperational.description: Connection is established and enabled, but communication has not started

ConnectionOperational.description: Connection is established and communication is flowing

ConnectionError.description: Connection is established and enabled, but communication is not possible due to an endpoint error

NoError.description: This is returned if no processing has been done or no error exists

UnknownStatus.description: The Connection is not monitored and its status is unknown

Rollback.description: The Connection was successfully established but was rolled back due to errors in related Connections in this ConnectionConfigurationSet

ProcessingStopped.description: This Connection processing was stopped due to some other error in the ConnectionConfigurationSet

ConnectionConfigurationSetInvalid.description: The ConnectionManager could not process this ConnectionConfigurationSet due to a configuration error

GdsConnectionError.description: There was an error related to establishing a session to the GDS

GdsProcessingError.description: There was an error related to processing commands with the GDS

AliasNameProcessingError.description: There was an error related to resolving AliasNames

ExternalSksConnectionError.description: There was an error related to establishing a session to the SKS

ExternalSksProcessingError.description: There was an error related to configuring the SKS

TargetServerConnectionError.description: There was an error related to establishing a session to the target Server

ResolvingNamespacesError.description: There was an error resolving Namespaces

ResolvingPathsError.description: There was an error resolving BrowsePaths

VerifyAssetError.description: There was a verification error on an Asset

VerifyFunctionalEntityError.description: There was a verification error on a FunctionalEntity

CreateConnectionEndpointError.description: There was an error creating a ConnectionEndpoint

EstablishControlError.description: There was an error establishing control of a FunctionalEntity

SetConfigurationDataError.description: There was an error setting configuration information in the FunctionalEntity

ReassignControlError.description: There was an error reassigning the control of a FunctionalEntity

ReserveCommunicationIdsError.description: There was an error related to reserving ids

SetCommunicationConfigurationError.description: There was an error related to configuring communication

EnableCommunicationError.description: There was an error enabling communication

CloseConnectionError.description: There was an error closing a connection

LocalSksKeyPushError.description: The internal SKS is having a problem with pushing keys to a target Server

RuntimeError.description: There was an error in a running operation

Name.description: BrowseName of the related <Connection> Node in the ConnectionConfigurationSet

StartEditing.description: The ConnectionManager shall allow editing of the ConnectionConfigurationSets.

CommitUpdates.description: The ConnectionManager shall commit all updates from the ConnectionConfigurationSets.

DiscardUpdates.description: The ConnectionManager shall discard the updates to the ConnectionConfigurationSets.

ActionEstablishConnectionsDisabled.description: The ConnectionManager shall establish disabled Connections from the ConnectionConfigurationSets.

ActionEstablishConnections.description: The ConnectionManager shall establish Connections from the ConnectionConfigurationSets.

ActionRemoveConnections.description: The ConnectionManager shall disable and remove Connections from the ConnectionConfigurationSets.

ActionEnableConnections.description: The ConnectionManager shall enable Connections from the ConnectionConfigurationSets.

ActionDisableConnections.description: The ConnectionManager shall disable Connections from the ConnectionConfigurationSets.

ElementAdd.description: The ConnectionConfigurationSet is added to the ConnectionManager configuration.

ElementRemove.description: The ConnectionConfigurationSet is removed from the ConnectionManager configuration.

ElementReplace.description: The ConnectionConfigurationSet is replaced in the ConnectionManager configuration.
